languages.text: {n}Абеляр белеет как полотно при взгляде на страшную фигуру "Теодоры".{/n} "Избави {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g} нас от поганых наваждений {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр белеет как полотно при взгляде на страшную фигуру "Теодоры".{/n} "Избави {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g} нас от поганых наваждений {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}At the sight of the terrifying "Theodora," Abelard's face turns sickly pale.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} spare us from the cursed apparitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}..."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр белеет как полотно при взгляде на страшную фигуру "Теодоры".{/n} "Избави {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g} нас от поганых наваждений {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}At the sight of the terrifying "Theodora", Abelard's face turns sickly pale.{/n} "Throne spare us from the cursed apparitions of the Archenemy..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At the sight of the terrifying "Theodora," Abelard's face turns sickly pale.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} spare us from the cursed apparitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德一见到面容恐怖的“西奥多拉”，脸色就变得像生了大病一样惨白如纸。{/n}“愿{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}保佑我们，免受{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}充满诅咒的幽灵所害……”
languages.original_text: {n}At the sight of the terrifying "Theodora," Abelard's face turns sickly pale.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} spare us from the cursed apparitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德一见到面容恐怖的“西奥多拉”，脸色就变得像生了大病一样惨白如纸。{/n}“愿{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}保佑我们，免受{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}充满诅咒的幽灵所害……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Al ver a la horripilante «Theodora», el rostro de Abelard adquiere una palidez enfermiza.{/n} «Que el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g} nos proteja de las apariciones blasfemas del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}...».
languages.original_text: {n}At the sight of the terrifying "Theodora," Abelard's face turns sickly pale.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} spare us from the cursed apparitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al ver a la horripilante «Theodora», el rostro de Abelard adquiere una palidez enfermiza.{/n} «Que el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g} nos proteja de las apariciones blasfemas del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}恐ろしい『シオドーラ』を見て、アベラルドの顔は青ざめた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}よ、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の忌々しき幻影より我らを救い給え…」
languages.original_text: {n}At the sight of the terrifying "Theodora," Abelard's face turns sickly pale.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} spare us from the cursed apparitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}恐ろしい『シオドーラ』を見て、アベラルドの顔は青ざめた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}よ、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の忌々しき幻影より我らを救い給え…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Beim Anblick der Furcht erregenden "Theodora" weicht alle Farbe aus Abelards Gesicht.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} bewahre uns vor den verfluchten Erscheinungen des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeindes{/g} ..."
languages.original_text: {n}At the sight of the terrifying "Theodora," Abelard's face turns sickly pale.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} spare us from the cursed apparitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Beim Anblick der Furcht erregenden "Theodora" weicht alle Farbe aus Abelards Gesicht.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} bewahre uns vor den verfluchten Erscheinungen des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeindes{/g} ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard blêmit à la vue de la créature monstrueuse.{/n} « Le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} nous préserve des funestes apparitions du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}... »
languages.original_text: {n}At the sight of the terrifying "Theodora," Abelard's face turns sickly pale.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} spare us from the cursed apparitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard blêmit à la vue de la créature monstrueuse.{/n} « Le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} nous préserve des funestes apparitions du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Korkunç "Theodora"yı gören Abelard'ın yüzü kireç kesiliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g} bizi {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} lanetli heyulalarından korusun..."
languages.original_text: {n}At the sight of the terrifying "Theodora," Abelard's face turns sickly pale.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} spare us from the cursed apparitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Korkunç "Theodora"yı gören Abelard'ın yüzü bembeyaz oluyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g} bizi {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın lanetli heyulalarından korusun..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
